ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So as for orphans, do not oppress them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So do not oppress the orphan,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Therefore, be not harsh with the orphan;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore do not oppress the orphan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Therefore, treat not the orphan with oppression.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore, as for the orphan, do not oppress (him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: As for the orphan, do not oppress him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Therefore do not treat the orphan with harshness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore as to the orphan, be thou not Unto him overbearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So, as for the orphan, do not oppress him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therefore, treat not the orphan with harshness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Therefore, treat not the orphan with oppression,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Therefore, do not mistreat the orphan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [93:9] So, as for the orphan, do not oppress [him], by appropriating his wealth or otherwise,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: So he also said: (Therefore the orphan oppress not) do not transgress on him nor deride him,
